channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Spotify appears to be having a major outage right now
item.description: The music streamer says it's looking into the issue.

item.title: Marco Rubio’s Disingenuous Explanation of the Abrego Garcia Case

item.title: Pentagon inspector general report reignites feud over Space Command headquarters relocation
item.description: A new report from the Pentagon's inspector general has added to the debate over the permanent location of Space Command headquarters.

item.title: ‘China’s Elon Musk’ uses just two numbers to demonstrate why his country’s auto industry is now outcompeting the U.S. and Europe
item.description: Xiaopeng He used two numbers to describe the breakneck pace of EV innovation in China.

item.title: Why The Girlboss Space Launch Was A Giant Step Back For Womankind
item.description: This supposed great boon for feminism was actually a bust.

item.title: Why a top HR executive at PwC says that in an AI-fueled labor market ‘skills are currency’
item.description: Managing director Kimberly Jones says that employees at the company pick who they want to work with based on their skills, not titles.

item.title: Senators, Don’t Fall For Hillary Clinton’s Desperate Lies About The SAVE Act
item.description: The left is peddling the myth that the SAVE Act will disenfranchise married women from voting. Nothing could be further from the truth.

item.title: Tariff Critics Have No Answer To Trump’s National Security Arguments About Chinese Manufacturing
item.description: The onus is on those whose favored policies have left us imperiled to present a better plan than Trump’s to defend America’s interests.

item.title: A Minecraft Movie Fights Cultural Inertia with Joy
item.description: Jared Hess’s gamer movie dreams of capitalist innovation.

item.title: Bill taking aim at IRS would strip agency of guns and ammo
item.description: Rep. Barry Moore and several other House Republicans push the "Why Does the IRS Need Guns Act" that would strip the IRS of firearms and ammunition.

item.description: The Trump administration’s overreaching demands of Harvard are merely a symptom of excessive federal involvement in universities.

item.title: Trump administration refers Letitia James for criminal charges
item.description: The Trump administration is referring New York Attorney General Letitia James for potential criminal charges related to mortgage fraud.

item.title: Free Traders Are Talking Past the Working Class
item.description: The free trade case is correct. But free traders need to frame their arguments differently.
